channel.title: Lock please
channel.description: found it out by me self no thanks to all u noobie coders that think ur good.

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @21_rush_12 21 rush 12
item.description:
@21_rush_12 wrote:

god i had to figure this out by my self and it was so EASY!!! omg…

all u need to do is search

public void youdied()

and you will see this. ( all codes high lited in red are the ones u change )

public void youdied() { for(int r=0; r 0) && (item < 0)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } for(int rr=0; rr 0 && playerItems[rr] < 0) { //createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); //createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]); deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]); } } catch(Exception e) { } } removeAllItems(); for(int r=0; r 0) && (item < 0)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } for(int rr=0; rr 0 && playerItems[rr] < 0) { //createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); //createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]); deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]); } } catch(Exception e) { } } removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3051; teleportToY = 3490; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("HA NOOB U DIED BITCH!!!!"); sendMessage("NOW TYPE ::home to get back."); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

now as u can see there are three things here all u do is change these three 0s to 10000.

if((item > 0) && (item < 10000)) if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 10000) if((item > 0) && (item < 10000))

everyone i asked for help and think ur a good coder ( WELL UR NOT) took me 5 minutes to find this out by my self.

retards[br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2007, 03:05:16 PM[/size][hr]and they say im not a good coder pfft.

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“21 rush 12, post:1, topic:146508”]hey, i am a ok coder and gdisigner but i get stuck on some things. its funny cuz im bro at global objecting but i cant figure this out.

question:

how do i make it so when you die you loose items? cuz when i you die in my server it just lets u keep them…[/quote]

If you were an “OK” coder, you would know how to fix this… removeAllItems(); … Isn’t correct rlly… Go to that void, and change it… Maybe that void lets you keep items…?

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Go to the client.java and ctrl+f and type removeAllItems(); teleportToY = then remove removeAllItems(); and you’re done.
